description.value:
Trigger A creature enters the area, and that creature is not a clockwork soldier and is not openly wearing a security badge

Effect The trap fills the area with frigid air, which deals @Damage[(2d8+7)[cold]] damage to creatures in the area (@Check[fortitude|dc:22|basic] save). Clockwork soldiers and any creatures openly wearing a security badge are immune to this damage. The trap then rolls initiative.

details.description: Magical sensors trigger clockwork cryomisters to expel frigid air, freezing intruders and potentially encasing them in a block of ice.
details.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:22] (expert) to disable the cryomisters, or @Check[arcana|dc:24] (expert) to trick the magical sensors, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (3rd rank; counteract DC 24) to counteract the sensors

publication.title: Pathfinder #215: To Blot Out the Sun

details.routine:
(1 action) On its turn, the trap fills the area with frigid air, which deals @Damage[(2d8+7)[cold]] damage to creatures in the area. Creatures damaged must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:22] save. Clockwork soldiers and any creatures wearing a security badge are immune to this damage. The accumulating ice causes the floor in the area to become difficult terrain that lasts for 1 minute after the trap's routine ends.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage and increases its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed] condition by 1.

Failure The target takes full damage and increases its slowed condition by 1.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and increases its slowed condition by 2.

Once a creature's actions are reduced to 0 by this slowed condition, the creature is completely encased in ice. The ice has Hardness 5 and 20 Hit Points, and its DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Force Open] is DC 22. Breaking the ice frees the creature and reduces their slowed condition by 1. Each round a creature is encased in ice, they take @Damage[(1d8+7)[cold]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:22|basic] save).
